subject: Order not in expected timeline
description_text:
Hello? This is a 2nd attempt to reach support about this.

ORDER NUMBER:  #SSN4997

I ordered this 12/17 with express shipping - stated to be 2-5 days. (See
picture to where you estimate 2-5 days).
[image: image.png]
Even if it takes a few days to start shipping, which it did, shipping the
19th, the latest it should still be here is by the 24th?

This stated product I paid for was a major contributor to my decision to
purchase and I feel deceived.


Is this an error on fedexs end? When can I expect my package to arrive, and
if after the delivery period I purchased and was advertised, what
compensation can I expect to receive?

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Cory Clark,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order has already been shipped, and we are unable to make any changes. Additionally, the Black Plus X pedals are currently out of stock at our US warehouse.

No problem, super excited to receive them regardless!

On Thu, Dec 18, 2025 at 11:02 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi,
I paid for express shipping but fedex is showing standard shipping with a
delivery date of 12/27?

On Thu, Dec 18, 2025 at 11:18 PM service@simsonn.com

Hello?
I ordered this 12/17 with express shipping - stated to be 2-5 days. Even if
it takes a few days to start shipping, which it did, shipping the 19th, the
latest should still be here by is the 24th?

Is this an error on fedexs end? When can I expect my package to arrive, and
if after the delivery period I purchased, what compensation can I expect to
receive?

Thank you.

On Fri, Dec 19, 2025 at 8:27 PM Cory Clark <coryclarkinsurance@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Hi,
> I paid for express shipping but fedex is showing standard shipping with a
> delivery date of 12/27?
>
> On Thu, Dec 18, 2025 at 11:18 PM service@simsonn.com
ID 为 8550 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单8550  
      主题: Re: Order #SSN4997 confirmed  
      描述:  Hello! I just had two questions- one, I just want to confirm that my order includes the VAM motors, and two I was wondering if I could change my color selection black instead of silver?  
   
 I rushed through my purchase because I was excited :) 
   
 Excited to receive them even if they’re silver! 
   
 Thank you! 
   
 Cory

Hi Cory Clark,   Due to the peak season, there are some delays in logistics and warehouse processing. We will notify our operations team to prioritize your urgent request.

The product has already shipped and it looks like you guys failed to
properly label it as express shipping- everything on FedEx is showing FedEx
Ground- not express. I paid for express shipping and now did not receive
what I paid for and would expect some form of compensation.

On Mon, Dec 22, 2025 at 9:38 AM service@simsonn.com

My order came in today but did not have the VAM pro motors, are these
coming in another package?
